original: 司隸京兆人，杜有道之妻。貞淑有識量，長於鑑人。曾預見何晏、鄧颺等人必被司馬懿誅除；又斷言傅咸、杜預能成大器。
text: Si Li Jingzhao, the wife of Du Youdao. Zhenshu is knowledgeable and better than Jianren. It was foreseen that He Yan, Deng Yang, and others would be banished by Sima Yi; he also asserted that Fu Xian and Du Yu could become great weapons.
